thread.title: Little Mix and Ariana Grande join forces for an eye-popping performance to launch their Dangerous Women world tour
thread.title_full: Little Mix and Ariana Grande join forces for an eye-popping performance to launch their Dangerous Women world tour

author: tpearce
title: Little Mix and Ariana Grande join forces for an eye-popping performance to launch their Dangerous Women world tour
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments LITTLE Mix and Ariana Grande have set Arizona on FIRE by showing what they’re made of and uniting for the Dangerous Women tour. 
The Brit pop band was chosen by the US starlet to join her on her tour which will cover the continental US. 
And the girls have ensured they have put their best foot forward and donned their iconic leotard army gear for the occasion. Getty Images The foursome have come long way since bagging the top spot on X Factor in 2011 Getty Images Perrie Edwards won over the audience with their killer songs 
The tour will now run for the next few months and will cover nearly every US state. 
Little Mix – comprising of Jesy Nelson, Perrie Edwards, Leigh-Anne Pinnock and Jade Thirlwall- rocked the crowd with their high intensity dance routines. 
Wearing black, green and orange army gear, the foursome looked ready for battle and showed off their killer pins in combat boots and high rising outfits. Getty Images The band are sure to crack America once and for all – and have started by dominating Arizona Getty Images 12 Ariana has taken Little Mix on tour for the first half of 2017 
Ariana then took the stage and managed to storm the stage with her pop hits and crooning to the crowd with a series of raunchy and classy wardrobe changes. 
Making sure her hair was always held firm by her now iconic high ponytail, the 23-year-old showed the girls what it took to be a universal smash-hit at such a young age. Getty Images Ariana shut the house down as she kicked off her tour with STYLE Getty Images The girls have celebrated the start of their tour by having makeovers Getty Images Little Mixs high energy routines are still going strong in the US Getty Images The Little Mix girls have their sights set on the US for the first half of this year Latest from TV & Showbiz Mixing It Up Little Mix's Perrie Edwards reveals new cropped blonde locks and goes make-up free for sultry Instagram selfie CELEBRITY BIG SNOGGER Bianca Gascoigne smooches with house love interest Jamie O'Hara while Jessica Cunningham flashes knickers at raucous CBB after-party 'MUM'S GOT A BIGGER PAIR OF LUNGS' Voice star says she could never follow in Page 3 mum Linda Lusardi's footsteps as she 'doesn't have the assets' status cloned Rick Parfitt's dying wish almost wrecked after widow he wrote out of will 'took' his treasured axe and a replica had to be made for funeral new skids on the block Top Gear bosses unveil new trailer to kick off campaign to make Matt LeBlanc, Rory Reid and Chris Harris show's new golden trio 'SO IN LOVE' Alex Jones reveals she is 'obsessed' with her newborn son as she shares sweet photograph of his tiny hand Awkward Celebrity Big Brother blunders as it announces Coleen Nolan had been EVICTED as she's crowned the winner 'Some people just have stardust' Gabby Logan says Usain Bolt is even more impressive in real life look who's back Coronation Street - Is Helen Flanagan's character Rosie Webster part of a drugs cartel? 'Make Mondays easier' Use your Sunday leftovers to make Jamie Oliver's delicious Singapore Noodles BACK TO BEING BARRISTER Judge Rinder will resume his legal eagle role on ITV on Monday according to his glamorous courtroom assistant Michelle Hassan Carters in crisis EastEnders - The only person Mick feels he can rely on right now is Whitney... Getty Images Leigh-Anne looked stunning in strappy gear with suspenders and fishnets Getty Images Jesy showed the US what she was made of as she crooned the crowd Getty Images The tiny pop starlet dominated the stage with her powerful vocals and killer stage show Getty Images Multi-talented Ariana has created a show celebrating the best female talent on the market right now Little Mix show off their moves in sexy new music video for Touch
